On Wed, 16 Jul 2003, wherboe wrote:

>    I want to get the registred version of Glad. I've tied sourceforge
> but I didn't get it and that Albert's Ambry didn't work. Can someone
> help me with step by step info on that source forge site.

To download Openglad from http://snowstorm.sf.net, do the following:

1. Go to the site and click on the "download" link on the left
2. Click on "Win32"
3. Click on the download link of the mirror that is closest to you (the
download link is the white page with two red arrows pointing at it).
4. Unzip the downloaded openglad into some directory
5. Run openglad.exe

That should be it for Openglad. For the registered version of the original
Gladiator, you'll have to try Albert's Ambry again or beat it out of one
of the FSGames guys.

- Yan
